text: Meredith Baxter (born June 21, 1947), or Meredith Baxter-Birney, is an American actress. She was born in South Pasadena, California. She has been in numerous sitcoms and television movies. She is openly lesbian.'Family Ties' mom: 'I am a lesbian' She is an alcoholic and is a breast cancer survivor. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Actors from Pasadena, California Category:LGBT people from California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television producers Category:American voice actors Category:Lesbians Category:LGBT actors Category:1947 births Category:Living people
title: Meredith Baxter
